name: GameDev.SE Dark
description: Dark theme for Game Development Stack Exchange.
additional_info:
This theme does not apply to:
 - user pages
 - help pages (includes the badges, tour, and contact us pages)
 - some pages related to revisions/reviews
 - chat
There might be other miscellaneous pages I missed, as well as anything I simply don't have access to.

Thanks to @abhishekchakraborty for the code syntax highlighting. I took it from their "StackExchange Dark" theme (https://userstyles.org/styles/124693/stackexchange-dark)
